rules_text:
When you cast this spell, if it’s not your turn, copy it.
Target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains protection from the colour of your choice until end of turn. [i](It can’t be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything of that colour until end of turn..)[/i]

OG_2:
Costed 3 mana

OG_1:
As an additional cost to casting this spell, you may sacrifice a land, artifact, or enchantment.
Target creature you control gets +2/+2 and lifelink until end of turn. If you sacrificed a permanent to cast this spell, it gets protection from a color of your choice until end of turn.
